title: MD
biography: Brendan Scott Crabb is an Australian microbiologist, research scientist and director and chief executive officer of the Burnet Institute, based in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.
aiSummary: Brendan Crabb is a infectious disease specialist with an H-index of 75 at Burnet Institute (Member). Has been published in Cell, Cell Host & Microbe, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
